official_title: A bill to require that fifty-dollar bills bear a portrait of Georgia Neese Clark Gray, the first woman to serve as Treasurer of the United States.

summary.text: Requires that all $50 bills bear a portrait of Georgia Neese Clark Gray, the first woman to serve as Treasurer of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to require that fifty-dollar bills bear a portrait of Georgia Neese Clark Gray, the first woman to serve as Treasurer of the United States.
